amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 119-38 to amend the definition of "Foreign Country Of Concern" to include any country that is defending a case before the International Court of Justice relating to an alleged violation of the Geneva Conventions of 1949 or their Additional Protocols or the Convention on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide; and to include any country the government of which includes officials that have outstanding arrest warrants issued by the International Criminal Court.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to amend the definition of "Foreign Country Of Concern".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 3 - 410 (Roll no. 81).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 3 - 410 (Roll no. 81).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
